name: Starfall Kindred - Eternal Bliss
description:
Story

Here tells the tale of four Vtuber friends. They had many adventures and shared great friendships. However, the power of skeb corrupted one of them and now they clash for the fate of every single person's wallet. Who will reign victorious?

This RPG was made as a proof of concept for something else you may see in the future! There are no random encounters, just go straight for the boss. Or if you're explorative enough, another secret may very well await you...

Now available for PC! (Scroll down all the way to the end to download.)

Controls

  • Z/X - Accept/Cancel (Press X in field to access menu)
  • Shift (Hold) - Dash (field only)

Starring the following Vtubers!

  • Joyeuse (Twitter | Artist)
  • Raine Yi (Twitter | Artist)
  • Bjorn (Twitter | Artist)
  • Jusagi-Chan (Twitter | Artist)
  • Something something secret (click to be spoiled)
  • And yours truly, Robyn! (shilling)

Feel free to share and stream this game with whomever you like!
